topics.body:
"@Splinter":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551403946368723ba1831b00#post_551403946368723ba1831b00
Sorry about that. I was trying to catch up on something I was reading.

A little Distraction doesn't hurt. Like a break between lessons. But It is still good to keep up the pace and keep going.

So Maybe you should time yourself. If you need to take a break put a time onto yourself on when you will get back.

Like maybe after doing five lessons take a 15 minute break and than get back to it.

topics.body:
I know it's about drama and such, but I just got my day made, basically what I've read this morning is you know how gamergate is still going on?  What's funny is that now that *everyone* on the net hates social justice warriors they're now resorting to trying to be internet tough guys and the response is funny.

Basically:
SJW, "You nerds ain't shit!  You're a bunch of weak ass fools who couldn't fight!  Fight me!  I'll beat yo punk ass!"
Boxers and such, "I live in the same town so I'm game; the gym is open tomorrow"

SJW movement right now:
!http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/410/019/243.png!
